question: What information is included in the ECG Summary?
answer: The ECG Summary includes ECG statistics (heart rates, ventricular and supraventricular beats and arrhythmia events, QT/QTc measurements, maximum ST elevations and depressions, and pace statistics) and typical ECG strips.  It also includes additional notes. (p. 6-36.5)
